comments.author: Passionxz
comments.body: It's gonna be here on the 15th December in Akropole RÄ«ga parking lot for only 4 hours. You can look at the truck, take pictures with the Santa, write letters and so on. It's more for the children and families but a cool thing to see if you are in the area, since it's never been in Latvia or the Baltics before
